channel.title: How do I make quest? 317
channel.description:
Ok, so i was minding my own buisness looking for some tutorials to help me make my server...
I see a tutorial labled, "How to add quest" under the 317 section.
Well, im going down to the comments to see what people are saying... Turns out the tut is a 5** tutorial so its useless to me.
So, im asking you! The community to make a tutorial on how to make/edit quest for 317's, or just tell me here.
I cant find it on Google, cant find it here... Please help.
